title: The Great Pottery Throw Down S01E01 PDTV.x264-JIVE.mp4
description:
Ten home potters from around the United Kingdom head to Stoke-on-Trent, the home of pottery, in their quest to become Top Potter. The potters' every move is watched over by judges Kate Malone and Keith Brymer Jones, while Sara Cox makes them feel right at home in the heart of the Potteries, Stoke-on-Trent.




The Great Pottery Throw Down - Series 1, Episode 1



The search for the top potter begins with a challenge to make stackable kitchen bowls.



Original Air Date: 03-Nov-2015
